name: Lunar Buggy
description:
LUNAR BUGGY

The Apollo Missions to the Moon are the most memorable of all of man's endeavours in space.
From the 1st landed probes and manned orbits to the actual landing of men on the lunar surface.
The failed mission that had to orbit the moon to slingshot back to Earth and the deployment of Lunar Roving Vehicles to explore the moonscape.

Experience it all in this amazing gameplay, beautifully designed and free to play for all ages.
Work through the Missions to find out if there is a Dark side of the Moon!
Beware the Asteroid fields and don't forget to report any Alien sightings beyond the 'Sea of Tranquility'.

"Good Luck Apollo,....Houston,..Over"
